translation: Each person devoted to their own duty attains perfection. How they attain perfection while being engaged in their own duty, hear now.
commentary: 18.45 Sway in Own? Sway in own? in action to duty? Abhirata devoted? sansiddhim perfection? Gets attains? Narah a man? engaged in his own duty? Siddhi perfection? For example, how? finds finds? That that? Listen hear.Commentary This is the division of labor for which each caste is fitted according to its own nature. Is the duty prescribed your sole support? and the highest service you can render
